lines: 1. Ler wang` chieng` orieny e gode,Orieny bende e wi nam;Lerne neno kwonde LegeKa ma jamni kwayoe.To ler moloyo ler wang` chieng`Nitie koro e chunya,Nikech in Kanyo, Jawarna;Ler nitie ka ma Intie.
Yaye lerno, madieri chutho,Lerno mantie e chunya;Ka Yesu odak e chunya,Oriembo kuyo duto.
2. Abolo kuyona dutoKak` iwito law moti.Iseruaka gi mor mari,Opong`o dhoga gi pak;Ageno piny Ruoth mar polo,Ma herani losona;En e gi maparo pile,Chunya mor kuomi, Ruodha.
3. In Jawarna, iseng`iewoa,Ngimana duto mari;Mond` anyis pakni gi duong`niKuom kit wuodha e piny ka.To ageno piny Ruodh polo,Ma herani nong`iewona.En e gi maparo pileChunya mor kuomi, Ruodha.
